description.0: Tribal tales tell of a great blade forged by the People of the Springs to protect a child who would embark on a distant journey. This particular weapon appears to be a replica of that legendary sword.

0.0: When Electro-Charged, Lunar-Charged, Bloom, Lunar-Bloom, Crystallize or Lunar-Crystallize is triggered, restore <cryo>12</cryo> Elemental Energy and increase Elemental Mastery by <cryo>60</cryo> for 15 seconds. This effect can be triggered at most once every 15s and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.
